author: barnabasbusa
content: Planning to run this test now:

author: barnabasbusa
content:
```yaml
participants:
# Super nodes
  - cl_type: prysm
    cl_image: ethpandaops/prysm-beacon-chain:peerDAS
    cl_extra_params:
      - --subscribe-all-subnets
      - --minimum-peers-per-subnet=1
    count: 3
  - cl_type: lighthouse
    cl_image: ethpandaops/lighthouse:unstable
    cl_extra_params:
      - --subscribe-all-data-column-subnets
    count: 3
  - cl_type: teku
    cl_image: ethpandaops/teku:nashatyrev-das
    cl_extra_params:
      - --p2p-subscribe-all-custody-subnets-enabled
    count: 3
  - cl_type: nimbus
    cl_image: ethpandaops/nimbus-eth2:pdsync
    cl_extra_params:
      - --subscribe-all-subnets=true
      - --sync-light-client=no
    count: 3
  - cl_type: lodestar
    cl_image: ethpandaops/lodestar:peerDAS
    cl_extra_params:
      --persistNetworkIdentity
      --supernode
    count: 3
  - cl_type: grandine
    cl_image: ethpandaops/grandine:hangleang-fix-negotiation-timeout
    cl_extra_params:
      - --subscribe-all-data-column-subnets
# Full nodes
  - cl_type: prysm
    cl_image: ethpandaops/prysm-beacon-chain:peerDAS
    cl_extra_params:
      - --minimum-peers-per-subnet=1
      - --data-columns-withhold-count=64
    count: 3
  - cl_type: lighthouse
    cl_image: ethpandaops/lighthouse:unstable
    count: 3
  - cl_type: lodestar
    cl_image: ethpandaops/lodestar:peerDAS
    cl_extra_params: [--persistNetworkIdentity]
    count: 3
  - cl_type: nimbus
    cl_image: ethpandaops/nimbus-eth2:pdsync
    cl_extra_params:
      - --sync-light-client=no
    count: 3
  - cl_type: teku
    cl_image: ethpandaops/teku:nashatyrev-das
    count: 3
  - cl_type: grandine
    cl_image: ethpandaops/grandine:hangleang-fix-negotiation-timeout
network_params:
  eip7594_fork_epoch: 0
  eip7594_fork_version: "0x50000038"
  genesis_delay: 500
snooper_enabled: true
global_log_level: debug
additional_services:
  - dora
  - goomy_blob
  - prometheus_grafana
dora_params:
  image: ethpandaops/dora:peerdas-as-deneb
ethereum_metrics_exporter_enabled: true
```

author: manunlp
content:
No fork (and so, no recoveries).
==> However, I activated later in the weekend the "ignore incoming data columns on purpose" in order to cause forks.
Prysm does not always correctly rejoin the main fork. I have to work on it.

author: barnabasbusa
content:
I'm using now all clients in my test. Some small peering related issue that I have noticed:
on a 32 peer network
* lighthouse supernode peers with everyone ‚úÖ  31 peers
* nimbus supernode peers with everyone ‚úÖ  31 peers
* teku supernode  peers with everyone ‚úÖ 31 peers
* prysm supernode does not peer with lodestar standard node but does connect with some lodestar supernodes - 25/26 peers 
* lodestar supernode does not peer with any prysm supernode but peers with some prysm standard nodes - 27 peers
* grandine supernode doesn't peer with lighthouse standard node

author: barnabasbusa
content: As of epoch 2 there have been no missed slots.
